sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Folder, File, ChevronRight, ChevronDown, Search, HardDrive, Clock, Star } from 'lucide-react'; const Explorer = () => { const [currentPath, setCurrentPath] = useState('/'); const [files, setFiles] = useState([ { name: 'Documents', type: 'folder', size: '-', modified: '2024-01-20' }, { name: 'Images', type: 'folder', size: '-', modified: '2024-01-21' }, { name: 'Project_Alpha', type: 'folder', size: '-', modified: '2024-01-22' }, { name: 'README.md', type: 'file', size: '1.2 KB', modified: '2024-01-22' }, { name: 'config.json', type: 'file', size: '512 B', modified: '2024-01-22' } ]); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); return (

{files.filter(f => f.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase())).map((file, i) => ( ))}

); }; export default Explorer;
